mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.province_id AS "provinceId", a.city_no AS "cityNo", a.full_spell AS "fullSpell", a.first_spell AS "firstSpell"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_city( id, name, province_id, city_no, full_spell, first_spell ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{provinceId}, #{cityNo}, #{fullSpell}, #{firstSpell} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_city SET name = #{name}, province_id = #{provinceId}, city_no = #{cityNo}, full_spell = #{fullSpell}, first_spell = #{firstSpell} WHERE id = #{id}
